name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hookwell - Save and Organize your Favorite Emails.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the email template with one tap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hookwell lets you save emails from Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, and more. Organize them into boards and then share them with your team or agency.

We built Hookwell for Google Chrome to help you save emails with one click.

Key Features

- Save emails from Gmail
- Save emails from Outlook
- Save emails from Yahoo
- Save emails from any web-based email client
- Organize emails into boards
- All Email Types Supported including 
  newsletters, promotions, and personal emails
- Save Email Content, Attachments, and More!
  Tag your Emails
- Share Links: Create a link to share a board 
  with anyone
- Download emails as images
